name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do. Fancy and easy AI inside your browser.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI Content assistant without all the bells and whistles. Use your own OpenAI API key, or for free and ad supported.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An AI Content assistant without all the bells and whistles. Use your own OpenAI API key, or for free (Yes, Free!)  and ad supported (but very friendly) through the Do. servers.

How to use.
/do write me a haiku
That's it. Just prefix any command with /do and you are good to go. 

Because most content editors are paid (Or free for a certain time only), we would like to offer a completely free one. No registration, nothing. Just begin using the Assistant, and you are good to go. 

If you decide that you want to use your own OpenAI API key, you can- just set that up in the Extension Settings.
